QuestData.Title: The Splintered Throne
QuestData.Description: The Lich King's throne once served as his prison. Kil'jaeden himself crafted the vessel of icy crystals from the twisting nether, its sole purpose to hold Ner'zhul's vengeful spirit.$b$bWhen Arthas struck the crystal with Frostmourne, he released Ner'zhul's soul, allowing it to merge with his own. Splinters from that impact are now scattered throughout the citadel.$b$bI shall require those shards, held only by the Lich King's most powerful servants, to seal the power contained in your blade.
QuestData.LogDescription: Highlord Darion Mograine wants you to collect 50 Shadowfrost Shards.$B$BShadowfrost Shards may only be obtained in the 25 person difficulty setting.
QuestData.RewardText: These should suffice, $c.$b$bSpeak to me when Shadow's Edge has been thoroughly empowered and I will attempt its completion.
